languages.text: "Знаешь что? Пожалуй, я лучше оставлю тебя здесь, как есть. Прощай, ван Калокс".
"Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."
languages.original_text: "Знаешь что? Пожалуй, я лучше оставлю тебя здесь, как есть. Прощай, ван Калокс".

traits.locale_text: "Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."
"Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."
"Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."
"Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."
"Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."
"Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."

languages.text: 「考えてみれば、むしろそのままの方が良いのだろう。さらばだ、ヴァン・カロックス」
languages.original_text: "Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."

traits.locale_text: 「考えてみれば、むしろそのままの方が良いのだろう。さらばだ、ヴァン・カロックス」

languages.text: “转念一想，我还是把你丢在这里吧。再见了，冯·卡洛克斯。”
languages.original_text: "Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."

traits.locale_text: “转念一想，我还是把你丢在这里吧。再见了，冯·卡洛克斯。”

languages.text: «Ahora que lo pienso, preferiría dejarle como está. Adiós, van Calox».
languages.original_text: "Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que lo pienso, preferiría dejarle como está. Adiós, van Calox».

languages.text: "Wo ich jetzt darüber nachdenke, möchte ich Euch lieber lassen, wie Ihr seid. Lebt wohl, van Calox."
languages.original_text: "Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."

traits.locale_text: "Wo ich jetzt darüber nachdenke, möchte ich Euch lieber lassen, wie Ihr seid. Lebt wohl, van Calox."

languages.text: « À la réflexion, je préfère vous laisser comme vous êtes. Adieu, van Calox. »
languages.original_text: "Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."

traits.locale_text: « À la réflexion, je préfère vous laisser comme vous êtes. Adieu, van Calox. »

languages.text: "Aslında düşündüm de seni bu şekilde bırakmayı yeğlerim. Elveda van Calox."
languages.original_text: "Now that I think about it, I would rather leave you the way you are. Farewell, van Calox."

traits.locale_text: "Aslında düşündüm de, seni bu şekilde bırakmayı yeğlerim. Elveda van Calox."
